name: Cloud Castle
description:
《Cloud Castle》It is a strategic tower defense game that builds your defense route by placing and upgrading on a grid map, resisting waves of monsters.

Map - a battle scene constructed from stylized plots, using turrets to plan the monster's path

Ores - There are a small number of special ore parcels in each map that can be collected by placing mining caves

Talent - Every battle will accumulate experience and increase levels, and each level will receive talent points that can be used to unlock more turrets and additional bonuses

Enhancement - Using the collected minerals to strengthen your turret can allow you to achieve higher limits in combat
